[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@acoustic-content-sdk/schematics-utils](./schematics-utils.md)

## schematics-utils package

Helper library to implement schematics.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [InsertChange](./schematics-utils.insertchange.md) | Will add text to the source code. |
|  [NoopChange](./schematics-utils.noopchange.md) | An operation that does nothing. |
|  [RemoveChange](./schematics-utils.removechange.md) | Will remove text from the source code. |
|  [ReplaceChange](./schematics-utils.replacechange.md) | Will replace text from the source code. |
